rows.label: tev060901_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Lularita if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev060901_MSG1001
rows.name:
Even Lularita, greatest warrior of caravan,
has troubles to deal with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG1002
rows.name:
But Lularita hear that city of friend has really wonderful
person who helps solve any problem![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG1003
rows.name:
If Lularita ever get close to end of wits,
Lularita plan to go ask for assistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG1004
rows.name: ...Person's name? Um, was it Hype? Harp? Hoop?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lularita about caravan defenses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lularita if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Lularita about enemies in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Drongo Caravan is safer than most with super tough
gal like Lularita around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0002
rows.name: Other caravans have own tricks for staving off danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0003
rows.name:
For example, Lularita hear they spread aprica poop
around perimeter to keep smaller critters away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0004
rows.name:
What Lularita want to know is how they can LIVE
in dungheap like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Every Nopon was talking about girl named Hope who
will listen to any problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0009
rows.name:
Friend should tell Hope that Lularita will be back soon,
okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0010
rows.name: Oh, and also that Lularita want help for free.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0020
rows.name:
Want to know secret training place of Lularita?
Place is what turn Lularita into super fighting machine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0025
rows.name:
Just find bad guys hanging out on outer wall when
friend climb out of ocean. It feel so good to just wail
away on them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0026
rows.name:
...Meh? What does friend mean, "weak"?
It took long time for Lularita to get strong enough
to beat them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Lularita about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Lularita about enemies in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0021
rows.name: Does it make Hope happy when people rely on her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0022
rows.name:
In that case, Lularita will let Hope listen to ALL worries
of Lularita free of charge![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0023
rows.name: ...Just kidding. Lularita will pay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0024
rows.name:
As long as payment can be in snuggle time with
adorable Lularita! Hope should be thankful for such
luxurious compensation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0027
rows.name:
There is huuuuuuge battleship that keeps lookout from
sky all day and night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0028
rows.name:
Anything that try to fly in front of it is blasted right
out of air. Pyoo pyoo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0029
rows.name:
Smart thing for friend to do while exploring this
continent is stay on foot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060901_MSG0030
rows.name:
They not watching the ground, or else Lularita and
friends would have been shot to bits already.[ST:wait ]
